column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Gastic C. - Thank you for your great review and feedback. I wish we had twice as many seats as we do
column3: and we make do the best we can with what we have. Furthermore
column5: countless factors come into play when seating guests -- last-second cancellations; inter-party miscommunication on whether everyone is present; seating preferences
column6: to name just a few variables. But as far as physical space is concerned
column7: we sometimes request parties of 5 to seat three in the booth and two in chairs in order to accommodate everyone. It's not always ideal
column8: but we try to keep it fair for everyone.
